A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am never watching this movie again. It disrespects its characters\, and it is a insult to the original trilogy. The writer/director destroys characters at the expense of a joke. This is a good example of not understanding\, the source material\, the characters or the universe. Such a missed opportunity\, and unfortunate that Disney did not invest themselves in this franchise. It is clear Disney only used our beloved characters as bait\, to have us watch this movie. Poor story telling\, boring sequences\, and it violates all the world building of previous movies.
